attributes.action: Return ownership of Britain's essential assets which were undemocratically sold to balance the nation's books.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Privatised utilities, transport, education, health, housing, defence... all essential components which constitute membership benefits of a stable country, were sold to private and foreign sectors... without as much as a national referendum!  And despite many generations having invested into these vital national assets for its future wellbeing.

No UK CE has the right to asset-strip the Co's heart for short-term (Treasury) gains.

It was immoral and undemocratic to do so in the first place; now ALL present problems stem from those myopic acts.

It must be remedied before British society decays further. And soon, even if it costs us all dearly in the short term.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Industry/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
